thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 3 of 25
thread.title: Aoife Kavanagh

author: Aoife Kavanagh
title: Aoife Kavanagh
text: We've had no trouble with Energia since moving to them so that's all good. My only frustration is the difficulty in entering a reading. I get an email notification telling me what my bill will be and prompting me to enter a reminder but when I go to enter (often a few days later) the bill has been paid and it won't let me enter a reading. I should be able to enter an actual reading at any point.
